name: Prisha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Hope you have an amazing year as a 21-year-**old**!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do.
text4: We realised that we wanted to do something
outroText: save us some cake for later, Neel and Charlie.
replayText: Click here if you want to watch it again!
